actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: One Bite and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage and minotaur gains temp hp equal to damage. Target: DC 13 Con save or infected with ravening (below).

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Charge
special_abilities.desc: If it moves 10 ft.+ straight to foe and hits with gore attack on same turn target takes an extra 9 (2d8) piercing damage. If the target is a creature it must make DC 14 Str save or be pushed up to 10 ft. away and knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall
special_abilities.desc: Can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

special_abilities.name: Ravening Hunger
special_abilities.desc: When it reduces a creature to 0 hp with melee attack on its turn can take a bonus action to consume creature's heart. Its hp max increases by 5 for every ten hearts it consumes in this way.

special_abilities.name: Ravening Madness
special_abilities.desc: Disadvantage on Int checks and saves. Considers every creature hostile and doesn't benefit from Help action or similar spells/effects that involve help to/from friendly creatures. Doesn't stop spellcaster from restoring hp to it or curing ravening with magic.

special_abilities.name: Reckless
special_abilities.desc: At the start of its turn it can choose to have advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn but attack rolls vs. it have advantage until the start of its next turn.
